snippet.title: PES 2015 - Official Launch Trailer [EN]
snippet.description:
PES 2015 - Official Launch Trailer [EN]

LIKE, Share, Comment / Subscribe to XboxViewTV ► http://goo.gl/SRfoq
----------------------------------------
Join Mario Götze to celebrate the launch of PES 2015 which seize a true return to four PES values. Of total control, super responsive control and renowned gameplay, where the user has unrestricted control over how they play.

PES 2015 will be released globally for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and Windows PC on November 13th.

http://pes.konami.com/
----------------------------------------

XboxViewTV PLAYLISTS ► http://goo.gl/QiGmHU
